EmailTemplate.subject: 1.1.2 Care Check request reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for completing your summer role application for NCS with The Challenge.
We have not received your care check information.
Care Check is the first step in the process to obtaining a full DBS (formerly CRB).This process will be completed when a conditional job offer is made.
If you already have a valid DBS (formerly known as CRB) dated after 30 April 2013 please email a scanned copy through to staffing.support@the-challenge.org
If you do not have a current DBS please follow the instructions below.
Please note you do not need to enter a password.
Visit www.carecheck.co.uk Click on the Applicant tab Please read all the notes and instructions Click on Click here to continue to your application Go to Disclosure and Barring Service (DBS) Application Click on Start Application Enter the Organisation Reference: evolutionrecruitment You do not need a password, press enter to continue with your application Enter your personal information to apply for the DBS.
Thank you for taking the time to complete the Care Check. You will be notified when this process is complete.
Warm Regards,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} t: {!Contact.OwnerPhone} e: {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c} The Challenge Network
Please Note:- We employ a third party organisation to carry out our tax, referencing and DBS applications.This process has no bearing on selection and assessment outcomes and is only followed up on post assessment decision. The purpose of starting this process at this stage is to due to a high percentage of successful candidates and the high volume of candidates we need to process.
CR 1.1.2
